data.title: Cravings Store
data.intro: Welcome to Craving Store, your go-to ecommerce platform for ordering snacks and food items online! Built with Next.js as a full-stack application using app router, Craving Store provides a seamless browsing and ordering experience for end-users.
data.description: A full-stack snack ordering app using Next.js and Prisma with PostgreSQL, featuring cart functionality and user authentication.

features.name: Next.js Application
features.description: Craving Store is developed as a full-stack application using Next.js, providing server-side rendering and a delightful user experience.

features.name: PostgreSQL Database
features.description: The application utilizes PostgreSQL as its database system for storing product information, user data, and orders.

features.name: Prisma ORM
features.description: Prisma serves as the ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) tool for interacting with the PostgreSQL database, simplifying data access and manipulation.

features.name: NextAuth
features.description: User authentication is handled with NextAuth, allowing users to securely log in using various authentication providers.

features.name: Menu Exploration
features.description: Users can view and explore the available menus, browsing through the wide selection of snacks and food items.

features.name: Add to Cart
features.description: Even before logging in, users can add items to their cart, making it convenient to prepare their order ahead of time.

features.name: Order Management
features.description: After logging in, users can proceed with their orders, view their order history, and track the status of their current orders on the order page.

data.title: Social Media App
data.intro: Welcome to the repository for the Social Media App. This repository contains both the backend API and frontend components of the application. The backend is responsible for handling data storage, user authentication, and API endpoints, while the frontend provides the user interface for interacting with the application.
data.description: A dynamic social media application built using the MERN stack for real-time communication, user interactions, and personalized content sharing.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Enables users to sign up or log in using their email and password, with authentication handled via JWT tokens.

features.name: Post Management
features.description: Provides functionality for users to create, like, unlike, comment on, and save posts.

features.name: Friend Management
features.description: Allows users to add friends, unfriend other users, and block users.

features.name: Tagging
features.description: Enables users to tag other users in their posts.

features.name: Image Upload
features.description: Supports uploading multiple images or a single image to users' feeds.

features.name: Personalized Feeds
features.description: Provides users with personalized feeds based on their interactions and connections.

data.title: Seo Master Landing Page
data.intro: This project is a responsive web application built with Next.js. The design is based on a template from FreeCSS.com and styled using Tailwind CSS. The application aims to provide a seamless and responsive user experience across all devices.
data.description: A Next.js frontend project focused on SEO, using static rendering and incorporating animations with the Framer Motion library.

features.name: Next.js Framework
features.description: The application is built using Next.js, providing server-side rendering and static site generation for optimal performance.

features.name: Tailwind CSS
features.description: Utilizes Tailwind CSS for efficient and customizable styling, ensuring a responsive and visually appealing design.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensures a consistent user experience across various devices and screen sizes.

features.name: UI Design from FreeCSS.com
features.description: The UI design is sourced from FreeCSS.com, integrated into the Next.js application.

data.title: Learn Hub API
data.intro: Welcome to the Learning Platform project! This platform is designed to facilitate online learning interactions between administrators, teachers, and students. With features like course enrollment, assignment submissions, automatic grading, and file uploading capabilities, it aims to provide a seamless educational experience.
data.description: A backend API for a learning platform built with NestJS framework supporting course enrollment, lesson management, and teacher/admin roles.

features.name: User Roles
features.description: The platform supports multiple user roles including admin, teacher, and student, each with their respective permissions and functionalities.

features.name: Course Management
features.description: Teachers can create courses, lessons, and lesson episodes, organizing the learning materials efficiently.

features.name: Assignment Submissions
features.description: Students can enroll in courses and submit assignments related to course lessons.

features.name: Automatic Grading
features.description: The system automatically grades courses based on students' assignment results, streamlining the evaluation process.

features.name: File Uploading
features.description: Users can upload various file types including Word documents, PDFs, and images in different contexts such as assignment submissions and course materials.

features.name: Authentication
features.description: JWT authentication and Google authentication via Passport.js in NestJS ensure secure access to the platform.

data.title: Cocktails
data.intro: Welcome to Cocktails Explorer, your ultimate destination for exploring a wide variety of cocktails! This project, built with Next.js and leveraging app router, allows users to discover and learn about different cocktails sourced from an external free cocktails API.
data.description: A Next.js frontend application for exploring cocktails, allowing users to search for and view detailed information about various cocktails.

features.name: Next.js Application
features.description: Cocktails Explorer is developed as a Next.js application, providing server-side rendering and seamless navigation between pages using app router.

features.name: External API Integration
features.description: The project utilizes an external free cocktails API to fetch and display cocktail data, including names, ingredients, instructions, and images.

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Users can search for cocktails by their names, making it easy to find specific drinks of interest.

features.name: Cocktail Details
features.description: Users can view detailed information about each cocktail, including its ingredients, instructions for preparation, and a visually appealing image.

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: The application is designed to be responsive, ensuring a consistent and enjoyable experience across various devices and screen sizes.

data.title: Movie Ticket Booking API
data.intro: Welcome to the backend API repository for the Movie Ticket Booking System. This API is built using Express.js and Node.js, with MongoDB as the database. It provides functionality for user authentication using JWT tokens, including refresh token logic. Additionally, it offers authorization features such as restricting certain actions to admin users only, like creating movies or changing movie statuses.
data.description: An API for a movie ticket booking system where users can book tickets for specific showtimes. Admins manage bookings, adjust schedules.

features.name: Authentication
features.description: Utilizes JWT tokens for user authentication with refresh token logic.

features.name: Authorization
features.description: Implements role-based authorization, allowing only admin users to perform certain actions.

features.name: Image Upload
features.description: Supports image uploads to Cloudinary using Multer for movie-related content.

features.name: Forgot Password
features.description: Implements a mail system for the forgot password logic, allowing users to reset their passwords via email.

features.name: Movie Management
features.description: Provides functionality for managing movies, including creation, modification, and status changes.

features.name: Cinema Company and Venue Management
features.description: Supports multiple cinema companies and their respective venues, allowing users to book movies at specific venues.

features.name: Seat Reservation
features.description: Allows admin users to insert seats for specific dates and movies, enabling users to book seats for their chosen movies.
